comments.raw_text:
When running a Firefox build with out-of-process enabled, about:support page is displayed with missing information. 

STR:

1. Launch Firefox with out-of process enabled (http://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/mozilla.org/firefox/try-builds/felipc@gmail.com-1e5a8c2cadba for try server builds)
2. Open a new tab.
3. Load about:support

Actual result: missing information in most of the fields.

Expected results: all content in about:support should be displayed properly.
